<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Persistent Mutagen](/Feats.aspx?ID=122) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 81 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Extend Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=113)

</column>

---

You've trained your physical form to remain stable within a given altered state. Once per day, when you consume an alchemical item with the [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=94) and [mutagen](/Traits.aspx?ID=116) traits, you can retain its effects until the next time you make your daily preparations instead of its normal duration.
